meanings.definition: The time of day when the sun is highest in the sky.
meanings.sent1: During noondays, the sun shines directly above us.
meanings.sent2: Let's have a picnic during the noondays.
meanings.sent3: The animals take a nap during noondays, just like we do.
meanings.sent4: In the hustle and bustle of life, noondays stand still like a frozen moment.
meanings.sent5: The brightness of noondays can be blinding if you forget your sunglasses.

meanings.definition: The period of time around midday.
meanings.sent1: We usually have lunch around noondays.
meanings.sent2: The streets are busy during the noondays.
meanings.sent3: Noondays are like the calm before the storm of the afternoon.
meanings.sent4: In the rhythm of the day, noondays are the steady beat in the middle.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of noondays makes you feel cozy and content.

meanings.definition: The brightest and warmest part of the day.
meanings.sent1: Children play outside in the noondays warmth.
meanings.sent2: The flowers bloom beautifully during the noondays.
meanings.sent3: Noondays feel like a warm hug from the sun.
meanings.sent4: In the noondays of life, everything seems clearer and brighter.
meanings.sent5: The golden light of noondays paints everything in a magical glow.
